name: The Carine Glades Tavern
shortDescription: Northern Suburbs - Pub food- Outdoor play restaurant
description: It has a large outdoor play area for children and has an extensive kids menu with generous serves

name: Whale & Ale Tavren
shortDescription: Nothern Suburbs- Pub food- Outdoor play restaurant
description: It has an enclosed outdoor play area and offer kids menu. You can buy activity bags for $2. There is outdoor seating availabe for families to enjoy a meal while their children enjoy a play.

name: The Life Boat
shortDescription: Nothern Suburbs-Pub Food- Mindarie Marina
description: The Life Boat is a pop up family friendly casual bar and eatery. Playground is sand based and covered by sails and features small climbing frame and slides. They are plenty of shaded outdoor tables.

name: Cabana Pool Bar and BBQ Mindarie
shortDescription: Northern Suburbs-Pub food and BBQ- Mindarie Marina- Outdoor Pool for Children
description: This follows the Bali Cabana pool side bar and BBQ. You don't have to stay overnight to use the restaurant or the pool. Plenty of pool lounges and grassed area to lie on a rug under the palm tree shade or grab beanbags. Lots of kid friendly options when it comes to food.

name: Ravenswood Hotel
shortDescription: Mandurah-Pub food - Outdoor Playground
description: Situated overlooking the Murray River. The beer garden boasts of outdoor picinic table style seating shaded with umbrellas.The playground is located at the far end of the beer garden. Also has an indoor dinning with a fireplace when cold and wet outside. Boasts of a huge menu and also caters to kids meal.

name: 3 sheets of the track butler
shortDescription: Northern Suburb, Butler-Pub Food- Outdoor cover play area for Children
description: Located in Butler, has an outdoor area which is covered in fake lawn
